name: JuggleMania - The "Realistic" Juggling Game
description:
Your new favorite and addicting guilty pleasure! This simple juggling game will keep you entertained with different arenas and objects to unlock, simple and easy to learn game-play, and the desire to become the next Juggle Master! Come catch some Juggle Mania!

Check out our other products:
AmiApp - Your friend centric journaling app!
DownNBack - A simple but useful cardio app for outdoor loop running!

Thanks for downloading!
